summary: Provides comprehensive integration tests for the TensorFlow implementation of the Whisper speech‑to‑text model, checking that audio inputs produce correct transcriptions and logits across various model scales, language settings, batch configurations, and hardware acceleration modes.
business_intent: Validate the functional correctness and performance of Whisper TF models before release, ensuring reliable multilingual transcription, efficient batched processing, and compatibility with XLA optimizations for production deployment.
